column1: Who all can add Videos to my group?
column2: You can choose who all can add Videos to your group while creating your group, by choosing the appropriate option for the “Videos Creation Privacy” field. You can edit this privacy any time by clicking on the “Edit group Details” link for your group.

column1: How can I add a video to my group?
column2:
You can add a Video to your group in one of the following ways:
1. To upload a Video, please follow the steps below:
a. Go to the group Profile.    
b. Click “Videos” tab on the group Profile. You might have to click on the “More” tab to expand the menu bar to see “Videos”.
c. Click on “Add a Video” link from the top left corner of the “Videos” tab to add a video.
d. Fill up the form to add a video.
e. Select a video source and enter a Video Link (URL) of the video you want to add to the group.
f. Click on “Save Video”, to add a video to your group.
 
2. From the “Apps” section of your group Dashboard, click on the “Post a Video” button and follow the steps from ‘c’ to ‘f’ as in case 1 above.

column1: How many videos can I add to my group?
column2: There is no limit on the number of Videos that you can add to your group. You can add any number of Videos to your group.

column1: From which all sources can I add Videos to my group?
column2: You can add Videos to your group by choosing the appropriate options for the  “Video Source” field. Currently, the available sources from which you can add videos are: Youtube, Vimeo and your hard-drive. The availability of video sources is conditional depending on the settings chosen by our site administrator.

column1: I want to search for a specific group Video. How can I do that?
column2: You can search for a group Video using the detailed search box available in the “Videos” section under group navigation.

column1: I have a group on this site. However, the Videos feature is not available for my group. What could be the reason?
column2:
The reason why Videos feature is not available for your group could be that, you might have chosen a Package for your group for which the Videos App is not available. In this case, you can see if choosing a different Package with the Videos App suits you. You can change the Package for your group from the “Packages” section of your group Dashboard.
Availability of Packages for groups, and their features are conditional depending on the settings chosen by our site administrator.
